trump is a criminal who colluded with russia to destroy our democracy, and foxnews has been only too willing to help.

reply_context.text: Rep. Greg Steube, member of the Weaponization of Government subcommittee, on James Comey: "In my opinion he should be charged with treason."

You can be mad at Jim Comey for what he did to HRC in 2016 and also decry any potential indictment as bullshit. You can do both.

because republicans are incapable of accepting responsibility for their actions, and impeaching trump would require that they acknowledge they had made a mistake supporting him as a candidate and president.

SO why is America allowing the demented old man to keep driving the country when he's been continually indicating a left turn while consistently turning right?

posts.text: The Good Place had it right. In a world where nearly all of the clothing is made in sweatshops, our food is made by exploited immigrants, and evil billionaires own everything: heaven isn't accepting new entries.
